experience.title: Software Engineer, Cymbiotika | Los Angeles, CA
experience.overview: Built a comprehensive Customer Data Platform integrating 8+ data sources, developed advanced analytics systems, and implemented AI-driven personalization strategies, resulting in $100K+ annual cost savings and 40% operational efficiency improvements.
applications: Architected and deployed a full-stack Customer Data Platform (CDP) with Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend, unifying data from 8+ sources including Shopify, Recharge, Dixa, Okendo, Klaviyo, and internal systems - achieving $100,000+ in annual cost savings.

Engineered real-time event streaming architecture processing 50,000+ events per day with sub-second latency using Segment CDP, webhooks, and Change Data Capture - reducing customer lookup time from minutes to seconds.

Developed a multi-dimensional customer scoring system analyzing RFM metrics, engagement velocity, health journey progress, and lifetime value - improving personalization accuracy by 30% and email campaign effectiveness by 25%.

Built advanced data extraction pipelines and ETL workflows for multiple platforms (Shopify, Recharge, Arise, Quiz) with automated scheduling and error handling - processing millions of records with 99.9% accuracy.

Optimized PostgreSQL database performance through materialized views, strategic indexing, and connection pooling - achieving 10-100x query performance improvements and reducing response times from 10+ seconds to sub-second.

Designed and implemented Tableau dashboards for customer journey analysis, churn prediction, subscription metrics, and VIP cohort tracking - enabling data-driven decision making across marketing and customer success teams.
Created an AI-driven product recommendation engine using vector embeddings and collaborative filtering - increasing cross-sell conversion rates by 20%.
Developed identity resolution system stitching customer data across anonymous IDs, emails, and platform-specific identifiers - improving customer profile accuracy by 85%.
extras: Implemented comprehensive CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment - reducing deployment time by 60%.
Built automated data quality monitoring and validation systems detecting anomalies and data integrity issues in real-time - preventing 200+ potential data quality incidents.
Designed database schema architecture with multi-schema design pattern separating historical, staging, and production data - enabling zero-downtime migrations.
Developed Redis caching layer for frequently accessed queries - achieving 1000x performance improvement for cached data and reducing database load by 70%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Baum Family Maker Space, USC | Los Angeles, CA
experience.overview: Developed software solutions for access control, real-time visualization, and automation, enhancing operational efficiency and security within the maker space.
applications: Developed an automated RFID door access system using React, TypeScript, Node.js, and MongoDB – reducing manual access management efforts by 90% and detecting 200+ unauthorized access attempts.
Created a real-time visualization tool with Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Plotly – cutting facility wait times by 35% and increasing equipment availability by 20%.
Designed and implemented AUSCAS v2.0, a UML-based data management system with RESTful API integration and Google Apps Script – reducing logging errors by 60% and improving workflow efficiency by 50%.
Optimized 3D printing job scheduling with a predictive prioritization system – improving job completion efficiency by 50% across 1,200+ print jobs annually.
extras: Developed a Grasshopper plugin in C# (using K4AdotNet) for real-time point cloud and depth image processing – enhancing 3D modeling efficiency by 40%.
Engineered an AR sandbox system using the Orbbec SDK in Python – enabling millimeter-level accurate depth map processing for 100+ architecture students.
Offloaded intensive computational tasks to GPU using OpenGL and Vulkan – reducing CPU load by 60% and improving real-time rendering performance.
Led a Python data analytics pipeline to visualize student footfall using Orbbec and Kinect sensors – reducing energy costs by 15% and optimizing space utilization by 30%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Divytech Blockchain LLP | Mumbai, IN
experience.overview: Developed blockchain-based digital coupon solutions, leveraging NFTs to improve accessibility and brand engagement.
applications: Led innovative digital coupon distribution for 10 prominent brands, eliminating physical coupon production, with anticipated cost savings of 15% and heightened brand engagement potential upon application launch.
Improved coupon accessibility and extended validity through collectible NFTs, fostering brand-consumer connections.
extras: Researched and implemented off-chain storage solutions for NFT metadata using IPFS, improving transaction efficiency.
Developed an Ethereum gas optimization strategy, reducing smart contract deployment costs by 30%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Masterbridge
experience.overview: Developed an NFT-gated marketing platform and an AI-powered phishing detection system, enhancing security and brand engagement in Web3.
applications: Led the development of an NFT-gated marketing platform using React, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, and Solidity, increasing brand engagement by 20% and improving user retention through seamless Web3 interactions.
Implemented automated testing with Chai and Mocha to validate smart contracts, reducing bugs by 30%, improving deployment reliability by 15%, and accelerating iteration cycles.
Directed a team of 4 in the development of a phisher detection model using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and PyTorch, improving threat detection accuracy by 25% for cryptocurrency networks.
Developed an innovative NFT marketplace, enabling designers to monetize unique artworks as NFTs, integrating ERC-20 tokens and alternate tokens to create a dynamic digital art community.
extras: Designed a Web3 identity verification module using Polygon ID, improving authentication security.
Developed a decentralized escrow smart contract for NFT transactions, increasing user trust.
